feed.title: Miguel Angel Ballen
feed.subtitle: Hi! You're very welcome to my profile page! Github pages is the perfect place to post interesting content and generate cool pages like this with automatic content generator (Jekyll).

entry.title: Relevant academic projects
entry.content:
Alzheimer’s detection using Math morphology and computing(more info)

This project used an important application of Mathematical Morphology. Theory that establish how operations over sets can help humans to detect diseases patterns in diagnose images like Alzheimer’s disease.

Relevant concepts:

Mathematical morphology

This set’s operations allow you to select and change some specific properties of a black and white image. These basic operations are non-linear, that means these operations cannot be plotted in a straight line over the Cartessian plane. Thay are set functions that involve union and intersection simultaneously. (Interesting! Is’n it ?)

Maplendar! (Github repo):

This project used some of the current best technologies for web-development and mobile applications development to a map and calendar application using microservices architectural style.

Used technologies :

Architectural styles:

Want more info about Ruby on Rails?

visit here

Bookshare! (Github repo):

This project used Ruby on Rails and Angular 2 for web app that was deployed on Heroku where users can log in, sign in, sell, exchange books and collections of book from their interests.

Used technologies :

Architectural styles and patterns:

Want more info about this patterns?

visit here and here
entry.summary: Alzheimer’s detection using Math morphology and computing(more info) This project used an important application of Mathematical Morphology. Theory that establish how operations over sets can help humans to detect diseases patterns in diagnose images like Alzheimer’s disease. Relevant concepts: Mathematical morphology This set’s operations allow you to select and change some specific properties of a black and white image. These basic operations are non-linear, that means these operations cannot be plotted in a straight line over the Cartessian plane. Thay are set functions that involve union and intersection simultaneously. (Interesting! Is’n it ?) Maplendar! (Github repo): This project used some of the current best technologies for web-development and mobile applications development to a map and calendar application using microservices architectural style. Used technologies : > Ruby on Rails > Django > MongoDB > Docker Architectural styles: > SOA: Software oriented architecture. > REST: Representational State Transfer. Want more info about Ruby on Rails? visit here Bookshare! (Github repo): This project used Ruby on Rails and Angular 2 for web app that was deployed on Heroku where users can log in, sign in, sell, exchange books and collections of book from their interests. Used technologies : > Ruby on Rails > Angular 2 > Heroku Architectural styles and patterns: > MVC: Model view controller . > REST: Representational State Transfer.
